external_references.description: ClearSky Cyber Security and Trend Micro. (2017, July). Operation Wilted Tulip: Exposing a cyber espionage apparatus. Retrieved August 21, 2017.

description: [CopyKittens](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0052) uses rundll32 to load various tools on victims, including a lateral movement tool named Vminst, Cobalt Strike, and shellcode.(Citation: ClearSky Wilted Tulip July 2017)
